text: Digaula ga ulu adu gi Jerusalem, gaa hula gi di ruum dela mugi nua, di gowaa dela e noho ai digaula: Peter, John, James mo Andrew, Philip mo Thomas, Bartholomew mo Matthew, James tama Alphaeus, Simon di ‘Patriot’1.13 ‘Patriot’: Di hagabuulinga dangada ala e hai baahi hagammuni gi digau Rome, mo Judas tama James.1.13 Matthew 10.2-4; Mark 3.16-19; Luke 6.14-16
